channel.title: Pvp text in bottom corner

item.title: Pvp text in bottom corner
item.dc:creator: @octavius octavius
item.description:
@octavius wrote:

I have been messing around with this code… trying to figure out how to make it say Pvp: On while in the wildy and Pvp: Off while not in the wildy… What seems to be the problem here? :] I am sure it’s basic but I am not bright enough to find yet haha.

public int WildyLevel = 0; public int leftwild = 0; public boolean InWildrange = false;

public void CheckWildrange(int pcombat)
{
if(((combat + WildyLevel >= pcombat) && (pcombat >= combat)) || ((combat - WildyLevel <= pcombat) && (pcombat <= combat)))
{
InWildrange = true;
} else {
InWildrange = false;
}
}

public void WriteWildyLevel()
{
if(WildyLevel == 0)
{
outStream.createFrame(208);
outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197);
sendQuest("@cya@On", 199);
} else {
outStream.createFrame(208);
outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197);
sendQuest("@cya@Off", 199);
}
}
